productDescription.line1: Lady Fit Syrup is an Ayurvedic medicine which helps in reducing the risk of vaginal infection, normalizes the menstural cycle and boost fertility
productDescription.line2: It also protects increases the homeoglobin level and increases the RBC count and Serum levels It is a herbal based syrup that is fortified with Ulat kamal, Manjhistha, Nagkeshar & other powerful scientifically proven herbs. It is 100% Ayurvedic and safe.
